questions.question_text:
The Enterprise Service Management Integrations framework contains common components to be used for integrating HR applications with third-party systems.
Which capability does the Enterprise Service Management Integrations framework leverage to communicate with external instances and third-party systems?

discussion.content:
Selected Answer: B
HR Implementation ebook page 179: Enterprise Service Management Integrations Framework provides a way to build HR integrations using the Flow Designer.

Selected Answer: B
B IS CORRECT

questions.question_text: What are some of the benefits of having separate COE tables? (Choose two.)

choices.B: Allows HR case agents to gather the right information based on the Service.
choices.C: Eliminates the need for an HR case agent.
choices.D: Eliminates the need to create database views.
choices.A: Allows for an extra layer of security within the HR organization.
